function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"National priorities focused on economic development over inclusive and sustainable development","Impact":"Increased inequality, political instability, and vulnerability to climate change","Mitigation":"Reorienting priorities towards inclusive and sustainable development, welfare of organised labour, protection of the environment, elimination of discrimination, and emphasis on social goals","Technologies":"Policy and governance frameworks, data analytics for impact assessment, community engagement strategies","People":"General population, organised labour, marginalized communities","Owner":"Government, policy makers, community leaders"},{"Description":"Lack of agile and responsive institutions","Impact":"Inability to address risk and reduce vulnerabilities, limited crisis management","Mitigation":"Development of agile and responsive institutions, capacity building at all levels of government","Technologies":"Institutional capacity building programs, crisis management platforms, digital communication tools","People":"Government agencies, emergency responders, community leaders","Owner":"Government, stakeholders, emergency response organizations"}]}
